Text: Um, thanks for the upload, but you failed to include the actual English subtitles in this torrent package. The IDX file is there, but these are not actual subtitles; this file simply exists as a bridge between the video file and a .SUB file. Why not just throw in an .SRT file and relieve us of the hassle? Thanks for nothing.
